sentences.en: A blanket of fog covered the fields.
He was fog-bound at London airport.
sentences.cn: 他因为浓雾被困伦敦机场。

sentences.en: His mind was in a fog when he finally got up.
sentences.cn: 他终于起床了，头脑一片混沌。

sentences.en: I said, "My car won't go in fog".
sentences.cn: 我说：“我的车在雾天里没法开。”

sentences.en: It will be a cold night, and there may be fog patches .
sentences.cn: 今夜天气寒冷，部分地区可能有雾。
这会让他们的望远镜蒙上一层雾气。

sentences.en: She heard the sound of the guns thundering in the fog.
sentences.cn: 她听到雾中传来隆隆的枪炮声。

sentences.en: Some fog warning signs had been put up with flashing yellow lights.
sentences.cn: 一些配有黄色闪光灯的大雾警示标志立了起来。

sentences.en: Synchronizing these attacks may be difficult in the fog of war.
sentences.cn: 在迷雾一样的战争中可能很难同时发动这些攻击。

sentences.en: The car and the van collided head-on in thick fog.
sentences.cn: 那辆小轿车和货车在浓雾中迎面相撞。

sentences.en: The fog cleared away and the full moon appeared.
sentences.cn: 雾消散了,整个月亮出现了.

sentences.en: The fog had lifted and revealed a warm, sunny day.
sentences.cn: 雾已经散了，看来是温暖晴朗的一天。

sentences.en: The fog lifted (= disappeared ) in the afternoon.
The ship, with the help of radar, sailed in thick fog.
sentences.cn: 船借助于雷达在浓雾中航行.

sentences.en: Thick patchy fog and irresponsible driving were to blame.
sentences.cn: 局部浓雾和驾驶员不负责任是罪魁祸首。

sentences.en: You should exercise extreme caution when driving in fog.
sentences.cn: 在雾中开车要极为小心.

words.tran_cn: 雾警信号手；照顾牛马的人
使模糊；以雾笼罩；使迷惘（fog的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 困惑不解，如坠五里雾中

trans.tran_cn: 雾，烟雾，迷惑，割后再生的草
trans.tran_en: cloudy air near the ground which is difficult to see through

trans.tran_cn: 使模糊；使困惑；以雾笼罩
trans.tran_en: if something made of glass fogs or becomes fogged, it becomes covered in small drops of water that make it difficult to see through

trans.tran_cn: 为雾笼罩，朦胧，照片（模糊）
以雾包围，使模糊，使迷惑
